channel.title: SFM
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SFM, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Oil major Shell launches $3.5 billion share buyback after first-quarter profit beat
item.description: Shell's earnings come as Big Oil's profits continue to fall from record highs in 2022.

item.title: Standard Chartered beats first-quarter profit expectations on strong growth in wealth management
item.description: The bank's Wealth Solutions division was a standout performer during the quarter, posting a 28% year-on-year increase in operating income.

item.title: Block plunges 20% as Cash App miss triggers downgrades
item.description: Analysts flagged fresh concerns around stagnant Cash App user growth, muted consumer demand and a soft macro environment that may weigh on monetizatio...

item.title: Exxon Mobil earnings beat as production growth and cost cuts offset the sting of falling oil prices
item.description: The oil major said volume growth in the Permian Basin and Guyana combined with cost-cutting measures largely offset lower earnings from weak oil price...

item.title: Chevron to slow pace of share buybacks as Trump tariffs and OPEC+ production weigh on oil prices
item.description: U.S. crude oil prices have fallen as President Donald Trump's tariffs raise recession fears and OPEC+ pumps more oil.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trumpâ€™s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
